amendatorysection.catchline: Failure of term; pending proceedings continued.
amendatorysection.para: No recognizance, or other instrument or proceeding, shall be rendered invalid by reason of there being a failure of the term, but all proceedings pending in court shall be continued to the next regular or special term, unless an adjournment be made as authorized in section 24-307.

annotation.para: Recognizance continues in force. Bartling v. State, 67 Neb. 637, 93 N.W. 1047 (1903), affirming 67 Neb. 643, 97 N.W. 443 (1903).
